value:
I learned to dance at my village...
Nothin' like how these castle-breds
do it.

Hey, uh... I'm practicin' my
routine, here. Could you...
could you not stare?

Dancin' is a good way to get your
feelings across—without ever havin'
to speak.

Brom had such a time dancin'
the night away with everybody
at my village's festivals.

So... This ball's a chance to
get all gussied up, is it?
Glitterin' like a jewel...

Howdy! Uh, I mean... Greetings!
I'm here for $Nf.
And... That's that.
Well, this is fine as fine can be.
*sigh*

These butterflies won't leave
my stomach be... C'mon legs,
get movin'!

You're a rare duck! Oh, uh...
thanks. That's what I meant!

I'm, uh... I'm Nephenee. Just a gal
born and bred in Crimea's
countryside. I'll dance my heart out.

This brings back memories. The
festivals in my village sure were
somethin'. We danced and danced.$k$pThe young, the old...we all got in
a circle, everybody dancin' and
laughin'.$k$pWe broke our backs in the fields day
after day... But come festival time, we
danced even harder than we worked.$k$pThat's the way to live.$k$pThat ain't possible when war is in the
air.$k$pWe gotta get rid of it—make the world
a place where there ain't nothin' to
fight over.$k$pWell, enough tough talk. Gotta focus
on my dancin'! Ready to teach me,
$Nu?
たあっ
やっちゃる…！
うっ…
痛えわ…
Let's dance!
Move to the beat.
Impressed, are ya?
A fine tune.
Need...more practice...
*humming*
I-is this right?
Hopin' this helps...
I never worn nothin' like this before. Not so easy to breath in, to tell the truth...
Dancing ain't nothin' to scoff at. I used to dance all the time back home...
Days like this, when everyone's havin' fun, are the best there is!
If only everyone back home could see me now...!
I bet you know a thing or two about dancing... Mind teaching me?
Right on time.
A one, and...
Step by step.
